com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.checking.dialog

Interface CorrectionDialogCheckCallback

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CorrectionDialogCheckSession, DocumentSession
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocumentSessionImpl

    public interface CorrectionDialogCheckCallback
    The interface CorrectionDialogCheckCallback defines the methods which must be implemented to get the result of the corrections dialog. Note: if you are not interested in callback events use the NULL object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CorrectionDialogCheckCallback NULL
      The constant NULL is a null object singleton for CorrectionDialogCheckCallback.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAfterCheck(CorrectionDialogCheckDocumentSessionController correctionDialogCheckDocumentSessionController)
      onAfterCheck is called when the user clicks 'OK' in the corrections dialog.
      void onCancel()
      Called when the user cancels the corrections dialog or the check.
      void onEmbedCheckingStatus(CheckingStatus checkingStatus)
      onEmbedCheckingStatus is called after onAfterMarking if AdvancedOptionsExtensionSettings.isEmbedCheckingStatus()

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        static final CorrectionDialogCheckCallback NULL
        The constant NULL is a null object singleton for CorrectionDialogCheckCallback.

    • Method Detail

      • onAfterCheck

        void onAfterCheck(CorrectionDialogCheckDocumentSessionController correctionDialogCheckDocumentSessionController)
        onAfterCheck is called when the user clicks 'OK' in the corrections dialog. You should save this callback in your integration and pass it to the DocumentSessionControllerProvider.getDocumentSessionController().
        Parameters:
        correctionDialogCheckDocumentSessionController - the correction check controller callback

      • onCancel

        void onCancel()
        Called when the user cancels the corrections dialog or the check. You might want to clear your saved DocumentSessionController in this method.

      • onEmbedCheckingStatus

        void onEmbedCheckingStatus(CheckingStatus checkingStatus)
        onEmbedCheckingStatus is called after onAfterMarking if AdvancedOptionsExtensionSettings.isEmbedCheckingStatus()
        Parameters:
        checkingStatus - the checking status to be embedded in the document
